All bug fixes should be sent to the latest stable release, currently releases/v1.

Major new features or features with breaking changes should always be sent to the main branch.

Pull requests without a descriptive title, thorough description, or tests will be closed.

In addition, please describe the benefit to end users; the reasons it does not break any existing features; how it makes the action better, etc.
